beats.text: ‘Oh, sweet $storyTime ... here is another page! And hold on, listen to that liquid melody. My tongue feels like a piece of old sandpaper. Sometimes $storyCity is too dry, Little man-cub. The $storyPollution sucks the moisture right out of your fur.’ |VS| He continues walking cautiously…

‘Look. We are not alone. See them? Them gathering at the watering hole? |VS| pointing at a Coffee Shop in the corner of $avatar_street street |VS| They are drinking too. Good! Let them drink. By the water, the Law says we are all brothers. No biting today,’ |VS| said $hero_name taking a sip of water.

‘Ah! That is better. Cold enough to wake the ancestors.’ |VS| He sighs, contented |VS|’I could stay here until the moon rises... but the truce does not last forever. We must move and find the next page before the hunger returns,’ |VS|while $hero_name gives you a small tap in your head…
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 3  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
